data.text: @RoyalReporter @royalmusing @NotMyPresidente @StoryhouseLive @CatalystSDC @ChesterTownHall Happy holidays, the family P.
@RoyalReporter @StoryhouseLive @CatalystSDC @ChesterTownHall Thank you, and keep trying.
@royalmusing @NotMyPresidente @StoryhouseLive @CatalystSDC @ChesterTownHall Thanks. 👍
@RoyalReporter @NotMyPresidente @StoryhouseLive @CatalystSDC @ChesterTownHall hope you are having a wonderful time ...... some place fun

@NotMyPresidente @StoryhouseLive @CatalystSDC @ChesterTownHall Yes. I’m on annual leave but let my paper know about this, which our online team reported here. https://t.co/hu0F4cgiKT. I always try to differentiate between fact (eg Harry and Meghan’s farmhouse in Great Tew) and conjecture.

@RoyalReporter Is this true? June 14 the pair, Her Majesty, the Queen and Duchess Meghan, will open the @StoryhouseLive theatre and the Mersey Gateway Bridge at @CatalystSDC. They’ll also attend a @ChesterTownHall lunch. This is what people want to know ... just the facts, no conjecture ...

@RoyalReporter @rafegirl Richard, you've just gone up a notch in my estimation. Please continue reporting that which should rightfully be in the public interest. The truth should always be foremost. We public deserve the truth, thus we rely on the integrity of the press.

@RoyalReporter @rafegirl Am sorry but I love my president you have no right to say not one in particular (Trump) it is right I never talk bad about the Royals so please be more professional by not bad rapping our President....thank you
@RoyalReporter That’s quite sensible thank You Richard
@rafegirl 😂 I meant any US president, not one in particular.
@RoyalReporter OMG if that were the case I would so want to know so I could move .
@rafegirl Not sure if you’re American, mimigirl, but if the US president set up a new home in your town at a big extra cost to taxpayers, should that remain a secret?
@TheresaPhilips It’s not clear. It wouldn’t be surprising if this was a temporary measure while a property at Sandringham or on Duchy of Cornwall land was prepared for them.
@RoyalReporter Will it be?
@LadySassington @HWalesWatch @RoyalSpectator @Maya86B @VWedderman @RoyalReporter You have all the good words 😁
@MairinMomag9 @HWalesWatch @RoyalSpectator @Maya86B @VWedderman @RoyalReporter  https://t.co/MYQasu7I5F
@HWalesWatch @LadySassington @RoyalSpectator @Maya86B @VWedderman @RoyalReporter I've co-opted 'all manner of' from @LadySassington . Better descriptor than 'a bunch of stuff' lol
@Ccc96619111 You clearly have no experience of accounting.  Either that, or your disingenuous.
@Ccc96619111 If you can’t distinguish between an elected representative and an unelected parasite, then there’s no hope for you.
@Ccc96619111 This article and the recent sleight of hand suggests that they have colluded with the Establishment, in order to hide the true cost from us.  https://t.co/yfDE52u5dX
@HWalesWatch @RoyalSpectator @Maya86B @VWedderman @RoyalReporter 😆
@Ccc96619111 Don’t forget that his brother’s wedding saw a temporary drop in GDP, and a fall in tourism.
@LadySassington @RoyalSpectator @Maya86B @VWedderman @RoyalReporter I’m going to start calling people good eggs going forward.
@Ccc96619111 Thames Valley Police cannot be trusted on this score.  Remember, they originally refused FOI requests, claiming that there was no budget code.
@RoyalReporter You're the kinda person when you say walk, people must run. https://t.co/OsBiLUpAFR
@Ccc96619111 Because we fund the majority of their sybaritic lifestyle - directly or indirectly.
@Maya86B What's going on

@Maya86B @LadySassington @RoyalSpectator @RoyalReporter This second home is nothing but a rumour. The whole point of the story is to provoke outrage, when and if KP confirm it then let’s debate the security costs. I should add when the Cambs regularly stay with the Midds there is undoubtedly extra security costs met by who??

@Jasamgurlie @RoyalReporter @ZoeLane7778 @InvictusbyPepp ... And most of the reporters are good people doing a good job about something that isn’t the most important thing at the end of the day. I’ve met Richard & he’s been a twitter friend since I became a part of this community. I respect everyone’s views but he doesn’t deserve this.

@Jasamgurlie @RoyalReporter @ZoeLane7778 @InvictusbyPepp I have been — a very active - part of the royal twittersphere & blogsphere since before W&K’s wedding. There’s nothing about these $$ stories that are any different than what we always see...
@RoyalReporter Go and no coming
@SusanATX @RoyalReporter @ZoeLane7778 @InvictusbyPepp Well then you are blind my dear because they wouldn’t shut up about it for months.

@Jasamgurlie @RoyalReporter @ZoeLane7778 @InvictusbyPepp I don’t see the false outrage except in threads like this. And I don’t think it’s right go after Richard for someone’s else article or try to make him accountable for all royal reporters. (And he does call that figure a “wild prediction” here. Isn’t that what you guys want?)

@SusanATX @RoyalReporter @ZoeLane7778 @InvictusbyPepp THAT’S what made them extra...and that’s me being nice. They purposely spread false information to create outrage when again the police was quoted to saying “no it’ll just be £4m but we won’t know until the wedding happens & People show up”. But that’s not what they spread. 😒

@SusanATX @RoyalReporter @ZoeLane7778 @InvictusbyPepp Yes because THEY are so accurate. Who said he wrote the original article? But as journalist you report facts. And him on Twitter & everywhere else did not bother. Why? Because they wanted to make this wedding into a scandal it was didn’t need to be. Whining over procession etc...
@ZoeLane7778 @RoyalReporter It's the Royals there is always going to be security and there's always going to be a cost associated with it. It's not different then other these of state.
@RoyalReporter Is it confirmed that the property is Harry and Meghan's?
@SusanATX @Jasamgurlie @RoyalReporter @InvictusbyPepp Real journo’s report FACTS

@Jasamgurlie @RoyalReporter @ZoeLane7778 @InvictusbyPepp (It was from Bridebook btw, a UK app.) There was nothing about that article different than any other royal family finance story. And more importantly, Richard didn’t write the article. Why aren’t all of you in that reporter’s mention or perhaps the Daily Express editor’s?

@RoyalReporter If security is such an issue ( which it is ) maybe certain media outlets should stop talking about the place they could be renting . Hopefully the Queen will gift them a Royal residence in the near future .

@SusanATX @RoyalReporter @ZoeLane7778 @InvictusbyPepp The fact that they used https://t.co/EZOZUV2Ihu as an accurate source over the police that quoted around that same time that it would be £4m. Now US will quote whatever the UK say on this since it is about local costs. They won’t know...but jumping at that number was extra.

@Jasamgurlie @RoyalReporter @ZoeLane7778 @InvictusbyPepp The Express - along wih every other British paper and a large amount of US pubs - cited and quotes BB throughout. How was this making it extra?
@Ccc96619111 Ahhh we can be friends 😉😊
@Maya86B @RoyalSpectator @VWedderman @RoyalReporter I know you’re not mean 😘 I’m just looking after my mate. I haven’t caught up on the controversy xx
@RoyalSpectator @Maya86B @VWedderman @RoyalReporter Guys, RS is a good egg 💗

@VWedderman @SchuylerSistas_ He did speak to the BBC. I also arranged to speak to him about the wedding costs and additionally to ask him about the costs of protecting Harry and Meghan in that farmhouse.

@Ccc96619111 Exactly!! My point is as a member of the BRF Meghan has entitlements and be it security or jewels and clothing , media should not question her and Harry in particular. It’s stinks of double standards.

@Ccc96619111 Oh please stop with the independent woman crap!! That worked as a fiancée but now she is a married member of the BRF ! That rule doesn’t apply to kate so it shouldn’t apply to Meghan!Why should she pay for her own things ? She is the prince of Wales daughter in law.

@RoyalReporter @ZoeLane7778 @InvictusbyPepp £2m-£4m is what they said. Aka the reason why they will need to combine the cost with other events because the cost is lower then their personal estimate £4m. Y’all took https://t.co/EZOZUV2Ihu £32m and ran with it because like all thing Sussex related, make it extra. 😒
@SchuylerSistas_ @RoyalReporter The actual cost of security comes directly from the Commissioner of Police in an interview with the BBC.
@RoyalReporter @InvictusbyPepp You should have tweeted that first!! On your page
@RoyalSpectator @RoyalReporter And finally the Cotswolds property story is nothing short of a rumour.
@Ccc96619111 @RoyalSpectator So Meghan can spend the money how she likes them since it’s private money

@ZoeLane7778 See my tweets to @InvictusbyPepp. The current estimate for Thames Valley (the Metropolitan Police will also have costs) is around £2m though that could rise. Much less than the £32m predicted by some.

@RoyalSpectator @RoyalReporter Fair enough. Senior members of the RF need 24 hr protection. If the suggestion (although not confirmed by KP) that this Cotswolds residence should be protected privately where do you draw the line? Then every time the RF do anything private they should pick up the security costs.
@Ccc96619111 @RoyalSpectator That’s tax payers money honey
@RoyalReporter How much did security cost for the wedding? Not tweeting about that?!!why? Not provocative enough?
@Ccc96619111 @RoyalSpectator No it’s from the duchy of Cornwall which Charles pays for, he will be paying for Meghans clothes as well too 😏

@RoyalSpectator @RoyalReporter Yes the RF should pick up the cost of all security including the Trooping the Colour and protection for the Cambs. Or is the fake outrage as to cost and climate limited to Harry and Meghan?
@RoyalReporter But, no doubt, we’re still paying for it, and their membership of Soho Farmhouse.
